remarks: An edge of an undirected simple graph as second component of an ordered pair.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 17-Aug-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Alexander van der Vekens, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement: usgraedgop $p |- ( ( V USGrph E /\ X e. dom E ) -> ( ( E ` X ) = { M , N } <-> <. X , { M , N } >. e. E ) ) $.
